overview: Bathroom Stalls & Parking Lots  explores dating in today’s hook-up culture. It analyzes how dating apps have turned relationships into disposable and meaningless experiences. The movie takes a hilarious look at the culture of romantic relationships among gay/bisexual male youth in the Castro District as a Brazilian guy rummages through San Francisco’s gay clubs for his one-night stand in hopes of taking their relationship to the next level.
title: Bathroom Stalls & Parking Lots
